abstract: This festival in Knoxville, Tenn., will feature the second-ever presentation of the artists’ new collaboration, alongside sets by Anthony Braxton, Kamasi Washington and more.

headline.main: Big Ears 2016 Lineup Includes a Laurie Anderson and Philip Glass Performance
headline.print_headline: Big Ears Festival Announces Its Lineup

snippet: This festival in Knoxville, Tenn., will feature the second-ever presentation of the artists’ new collaboration, alongside sets by Anthony Braxton, Kamasi Washington and more.
